Name: Pia Carrot e Youkoso!! 4: Natsu no Koikatsu
Overview: Spend your summer in Pia Carrot number 7th, earn some pocket money and make friends, or even something more, with the cute waitresses. In this installment, you are not just a part timer, you can decide what the girls wear. The Xbox 360 version contains scenes that don't appear anywhere else, so be sure to unlock them. This time, the game connects the plots of the anime, drama CDs and novels, see how your choices affect the girls from all the different works in the series.Four top illustrators Ariko Youichi, Murakami Suigun, Oni no Jin and Naruse Mamoru join forces to create the event scenes, if you are a fan of their works, this is a game you couldn't miss.
